curl -X POST localhost:9000/geojson-ms-example/to-esri -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"s_srs": 4326, "t_srs": 3857, "geom": {"type":"Polygon","coordinates":[[[17.997695703125437,-2.7248332847933137],[18.008682031250434,-2.7467808973680055],[18.667861718750256,-3.3721059265768196],[17.997695703125437,-3.6681767935419702],[17.723037500000512,-3.350171067308244],[17.997695703125437,-2.7248332847933137]]]}}'

curl -X POST localhost:9000/geojson-ms-example/to-geojson -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"s_srs": 3857,"t_srs": 4326,"geom": {"type":"polygon","rings":[[[2003494.3211242114,-303441.4574822073],[2004717.3135767737,-305887.44238733227],[2078096.8607305232,-375598.01218339417],[2003494.3211242114,-408618.8084025814],[1972919.5098101492,-373152.0272782692],[2003494.3211242114,-303441.4574822073]]], "spatialReference": {"wkid": 3857}}}'
